plot: Actress Aishwarya Rai narrates and re-enacts aspects of the life of Mumtaz, the inspiration for the construction of India's Taj Mahal.
title: Journey Across India
plot_es: Actress Aishwarya Rai narrates and re-enacts aspects of the life of Mumtaz, the inspiration for the construction of India's Taj Mahal.
